body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Clark's Cars. My name is Carl Clark. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Tammy Howard.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you Tammy. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, three two one, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is t.howard@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information, Tammy. Is there anything specific you're looking for today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just browsing through your inventory for now, but I'm feeling happy with the selection I see.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear, Tammy! Thank you for considering Clark's Cars. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
